name: Open Source AI Tutor
promise: Turn one concept into a practical teaching path in 15 minutes.
ships: Lesson outline + checkpoints + learner prompt pack
how_to_use: Paste the concept and learner level.
Pick a goal and evidence target.
Run the tutor flow and review the checkpoint outputs.
limits: Not a replacement for instructor judgment.
Outputs require contextual review before publication.

proof.label: Sample concept to learning flow
proof.input:
Topic: Prompt engineering for workshop leaders.
Audience: Product learners.
Duration: 30 minutes.
proof.output: 3-session micro-path with one measurable checkpoint each.

name: AI Governance Checklist Builder
promise: Convert policy text into a deployment-ready checklist.
how_to_use: Paste your draft policy or risk note.
Choose deployment context and review cadence.
Export checklist and align with your review rhythm.
limits: Human governance review is required before rollout.

proof.label: Policy statement to checklist
proof.input: Policy: Access to generative tools is required for internal teams with quarterly reporting.
proof.output: 8 control checks, 4 evidence fields, 2 approval points, 1 handoff rule.

name: Architecture Diagrammer
promise: Turn a system spec into a first-pass architecture map.
how_to_use: Pick your trust boundary and scale constraints.
Generate diagram notes and review with your team.
limits: Needs human validation for production architecture.
Not a substitute for threat modeling tools.

proof.label: Architecture summary output
proof.input: Inputs: multi-tenant API, one external callback, and a compliance review queue.
proof.output: Node map with boundaries, data-classification tags, and deployment ownership split.
